channel.title: Fathers Day on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Fathers Day on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: What are you doing on Father's Day in Ann Arbor? Take our poll.
West Park grand opening, June 19 2011
item.description: More Father's Day events! West Park had a major construction project over the last year, and it's now being unveiled complete with a grand ribbon cutting and the unveiling of the sculpture in the park. If you were at West Park during the recent monsoon rains you'll appreciate that quite a bit of work went into stormwater handling, with very visible results.

item.title: Tour de Kids bicycle race, Sunday June 19, 2011, South U and East U in Ann Arbor
item.description: The Tour de Kids is an annual bicycle race for kids 3-12 held on South University on Father's Day. This year it's June 19. The poster and race map is below; details including registration information at www.tourdekids.org. Here's a chance to run a loop around the Diag! Sponsors include St. Joe's, IHA, Ann Arbor Bicycle Touring Society, and Wheels in Motion. The cost is $10 for an individual and $20 for a family (up to 5 kids).
